tool_description: ASR Hub is a nomalized XML API which integrates airline content from multiple sources like Direct & NDC connect, Multi-GDS and aggregators from various markets and  offers search, ticket, Payments, ancillary sales, and post bookings services through a single API.  ASR Hub 1.0 provides the complete Travel Tech Stack for Airline Retailing​.
name: ASR Hub
title: ASR Hub

api_list.name: /api/TripDetails/{MFRef}
api_list.description:
Retrives the TripDetails based on the  MFRef Number
- MFRef

api_list.name: /api/ScheduleChangeAccept/{MFRef}/{FlightId}
api_list.description:
Accept Schedule Change based on the UserInputs
 - MFRef
 - Flight Id
